name: Happy Valentine ♥
description:
"Today is Valentine's Day!

Plus, It's Gideon's birthday!

Albert really needs to wake up or Gideon will be super mad. Don't be late!"

There are 3 endings... maybe 4 depends on how you see it.

(A 3-day solo project of mine. I made it in a rush because what? I just thought of this a few days ago!)

(Also no beta, we die like me after making this game 3 days straight.)

If there is any bug, please do comment down below! I appreciate it!

(Or if you just want to comment, It's appreciated!)

Give my Instagram a visit! >>  @sunnieeoo
